preface.para: &productname; is based on &suse; &mos;, a special, minimalistic edition of &sle; 12 SP3, specially optimised for building and running &kube; clusters.

&kube; is an orchestration framework that is used to to optimize the use of containers. It provides a platform for automating the deployment, scaling and operations of pods of containers across multiple nodes in a cluster.

&mos; also offers a mechanism for safe, automatic operating system updates, which can be rolled back if required. &productname; allows for the provisioning, management and scaling of container-based applications across large clustered deployments.

listitem.para: optimization of hardware usage by using only the required resources.

preface.para: A &productname; cluster consists of four or more nodes running &mos;. Each node can host multiple pods of Docker or OCI containers, which communicate over the Container Network Interface (CNI). The virtual network is managed by Calico and secured using Cilium.

&productname; provides a web-based dashboard for managing the entire cluster based on Velum. Individual nodes are provisioned using cloud-init and managed by Salt. Configuration data is shared using etcd, while the container registry is managed by Portus. User authentication is handled by Dex.
